buildListData() buildListDataImpact ImpactbuildListData

Build the data used to represent the impact graph as a semi-flat list
Paramètres

array containing the graph nodes and egdes
int$direction
should the list be build for item that are impacted by $item or that impact $item ?

starting point of the graph
int$max_depth
